Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the next occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to perform SW-AE Assign Reviewers after SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total waiting time to SW-Reviewer Declined following SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Unavailable when both occur in the same variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Declined after the execution of SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Assign a Different Editor in variants where editor reassignment occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Average time between consecutive occurrences of SW-Reviewer Declined within the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that reach this stage
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Reviewer Declined compared to the elapsed time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time of SW-Reviewer Declined in cases that eventually lead to RW-EIC Accept versus cases that end in SW-EIC Reject
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to the next Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in multi-round revision variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Unassign Reviewer when reviewer unassignment follows declination
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Unassign Reviewer'

Name: Cycle Time of SW-Reviewer Declined measured from its preceding SW-AE Assign Reviewers to the subsequent re-invitation or replacement activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for SW-Reviewer Declined grouped by case:concept:name
Total time it takes SW-Reviewer Declined to be followed by SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Declined'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'total'}"
